title: Truck Terminus - In addition to minimum 60% area for parking of trucks, ancillary office, restaurant, hotel, motel, lodging facility for drivers, Vehicle fuel Filling station including LPG / CNG / Ethanol /Charging Stations for Electric Vehicles, auto repair centre, auto service centre, shops for auto spare parts, shops for daily needs, ATM, PCO, Primary Health Centre / First Aid Centre and provision for loading-unloading may be permitted
clause_text: Truck Terminus - In addition to minimum 60% area for parking of trucks, ancillary office, restaurant, hotel, motel, lodging facility for drivers, Vehicle fuel Filling station including LPG / CNG / Ethanol /Charging Stations for Electric Vehicles, auto repair centre, auto service centre, shops for auto spare parts, shops for daily needs, ATM, PCO, Primary Health Centre / First Aid Centre and provision for loading-unloading may be permitted. Moreover, these reservations may also be developed for bus stand, bus - MRT interchange with mall.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
